channel.title: Reset all skills? And adding some points?
channel.description:
As you know, my previous post is about the character tokens. But I've ran into another problem.
I've looked around the website, and i cant seem to find a command that were you talk to a npc, it will reset all skills, when they are all 99, of course with a warning sign that you will reset everything.. And if possible, adding +1 the character token ("prestige") and +2 to ("prestigeTokens")
Any help? Please and thank you.

item.title: Reset all skills? And adding some points?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

Jc22493:

An if-then-else statement should be fine.

Alright thanks alot bro. although what would be the If statement for all skills being 99? cant find that anywhere on here

Read full topic

Ohhh alright. Oh and sorry, but one more question. How do i make it required to have all 99 skills?

Alright, but how would I make an npc do it?
